thread.title: Lamar Odom's 12 strokes affect his walk and speech
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom's 12 strokes affect his walk and speech - Sports

author: Agencies
title: Lamar Odom's 12 strokes affect his walk and speech
text:
Washington DC: Former NBA star Lamar Odom has suffered a dozen of strokes during his medical emergency, which has affected his talking and walking abilities.


Lamar Odom 
Doctors say the brain scans of the former basketball player reveal that the strokes had an impact on his motor skills, TMZ reports.
Odom was put on life support following a drug overdose earlier this month.
